person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: New Zealand Prime Minister Jim Bolger , emerging from coalition talks with the nationalist New Zealand First party on Friday afternoon , said National and NZ First would meet again on Sunday .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
|--------|
| Jim Bolger |
| New Zealand Prime Minister |
| National (implied reference to National party, but not explicitly mentioned as a person) |
| New Zealand First party |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| Jim Bolger |
| New Zealand First party |

(Note: "New Zealand Prime Minister" is already included in the given person "Jim Bolger" as he holds that position. Therefore, it is not necessary to include it as a separate entity.)

location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: New Zealand Prime Minister Jim Bolger , emerging from coalition talks with the nationalist New Zealand First party on Friday afternoon , said National and NZ First would meet again on Sunday .

Let's think step by step.

| Location |
| --- |
| New Zealand |
| Friday afternoon |
| Sunday |

The paragraph mentions the countries where the events took place (New Zealand) and the specific days and times (Friday afternoon and Sunday). These are the valid location entities in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Location" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Location |
| --- |
| New Zealand |
| Friday afternoon |
| Sunday |

The paragraph mentions the specific locations where the events took place (New Zealand and the unspecified location for the coalition talks and the subsequent meetings). "New Zealand First party" is not a location, but rather a political party based in New Zealand. Therefore, it is not included in the table.
